component.name: Stretch Break
component.summary: Reminds you to take regular breaks

p.em: (Stretch Break is still maturing. If you run into an issue, feel free to report it on GitHub!)

description.p: Ergonomic support utility that regularly reminds you to take breaks from using your computer, similar to tools like Workrave and Safe Eyes.

ul.li: Automatically reset your break countdown when you've been away long enough
Snooze break reminders for a period of time or mute them completely
Enable reading mode, where the break countdown doesn't pause while mouse and keyboard are idle

description.p: Stretch Break works best with its accompanying GNOME Shell extension installed, which will display remaining time in your system tray. The extension is available at: https://extensions.gnome.org/extension/8231/stretch-break-companion/

ul.li: Add possibility to take breaks from the extension menu
Fix issue with notification removal when snoozing
Fix issue when enabling reading while idle
